Name: The Master
About the game: Perfect if you want to to have an extremely short and different experience. The Master is a first-person stairs climbing game. The goal is to reach to top. Warning: You may find this game boring! Contains hidden secrets. Contains online features: place panels that others can see when they play. You can see their panels too! Please rate the game if you finish it, to help knowing The Master.
